attributes.action: ban any sort of expenses for MPs, as they chose to have that job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mps choose to become mps and should be prepared to travel the distances to they work. the taxpayers have to pay for they expenses and we wish not to do so anymore!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
